description: Erection of single storey rear extension (6.00m in depth, maximum height of 3.55m and eaves height of 3.00m)
decision_conditions: The proposed extension would  be within 2 metres of the boundary of the curtilage of the dwellinghouse, and the height of the eaves of the enlarged part would exceed 3 metres, in conflict with Paragraph A.1 (i) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Condition 85 (Affordable Housing Strategy) of planning permission 20/02942/FUL states:An Affordable Housing strategy including the tenure distribution plan shall be submitted to and approved by the Local  Planning Authority prior to the commencement of any phase or any development within a Plot. Reason: To ensure mixed and balanced communities.Officer response: The submitted information is considered to be sufficient. As such, the condition  85 (Affordable Housing Strategy) in relation to Plot B, Phase 1 is hereby approved.

The description in the application form is for 'Change of use from residential C3 to House of Multiple Occupation C4(Maximum of 6 occupants)', whereas the submitted proposed drawings are for loft conversion, please clarify the proposal description and amend the documents if required.
